page.title: 18Cramlington:Attitudes
page.content:
Most people like living in Cramlington. They like having modern housing and new schools for their children but they are sometimes unhappy when they are not ready on time. Everyone likes the big shopping centre near Concordia but some mothers wish that there were more shops on the estates.
There are footpaths and cycle tracks away from the main roads so it is very safe, but some people don't like the underpasses because they often have graffiti on the walls and can be frightening after dark.
Everyone likes using the sports facilities and leisure pool at Concordia.
Burnside F.S.
